feed.title: Category: one-sentence week summary | Going The Wong Way

entry.title: No 4 AM?!
entry.content: What a joy it is that the little girl can sleep longer, and I can wake up later than 4 AM!

entry.title: Only Work For The Weary
entry.content: First week back to work after having a baby, and I was knocked out by the end of it!

entry.title: From Husband To Father
entry.content: It’s been a whirlwind of two weeks from water breaking to post partum to NICU to home, but all of a sudden there’s a little pooping girl who’s taking over my life!

entry.title: Unwelcome Do-Over
entry.content: There’s nothing quite like that feeling you get when you do something over to fix your mistake, only to realize that you didn’t do anthing wrong to begin with!

entry.title: Shopping And San Diego
entry.content: Caution: large amounts of shopping or driving result in extereme exhaustion!
